item.title: What is IRC? And how do I use it?
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:3, topic:240714”]IRC? for this forum is if u have a problem and u can report to the mods+ that are there,
and if u wana no how to make it then, u shud see RANT ON STAFF? or sumthink on server help,[/quote]

Other than reporting, you can also get help, and also just talk to other people.

Read full topic
item.source: What is IRC? And how do I use it?

item.title: What is IRC? And how do I use it?
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

The IRC is a place where people can talk, it’s a chat.

There’s a guide on how to connect to it in the announcements section.
